chapter.title: Introduction to JBoss XACML
chapter.para: JBoss XACML provides a standards based, robust Policy Infrastruture library .
JBossXACML is based on Oasis XACML v2.0. It

listitem.para: defines an API to read one or more PolicySets (and/or Policy files) via a simple configuration file.
defines an API to parse XACML request files or streams.
provides a JAXB v2.0 compatible object model that can be used to construct policies and requests in XACML.

sect1.title: Pre-requisites
sect1.para: To make full use of JBoss XACML, you will need a basic understanding of XACML v2.0 and its policies etc
Please refer to the following wiki page for more information on JBossXACML. http://wiki.jboss.org/wiki/JBossXACML
